New Records: The Philadelphia Phillies secured a playoff berth, marking a significant milestone in their season
Key Match Events: The Phillies' 12-2 victory over the New York Mets on September 20 clinched their playoff spot
Pre-Game Insights: The Phillies emphasized the importance of strong bullpen performance in their pre-game strategy
Post-Match Reflections: The Phillies reflected on their playoff achievement and their goal to win the NL East and secure a top seed
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Phillies' playoff clinching and division chase are highlighted as key points, along with their two-year journey to win the World Series
